column2: Arkhanâ€™s mastery of the dread art of necromancy is superior to even that of his fellow Mortarchs. He is so steeped in deathly sorcery that his presence bolsters and invorgates his forces.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
The dead do not sit idly by in Nehekhara...
Clouds of deathly magic swirl around Arkhan.
No creature is safe from the destructive power that Arkhan wields.....
